short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert any Json string to Java classes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert a JSON response to Java classes with just a click of a button. Helps to reduce time in creating Java classes to match with the JSON response when dealing with complex API response format.
